snippet: The Haggler pays a visit to the Staples manager who, in an earlier column, described the pressure that she says sales associates are under to sell warranties and accessories.
abstract: David Segal The Haggler column visits with Natasia Shah, Staples manager in Cypress, Calif, who, in an earlier column, described the pressure that she says sales associates are under to sell warranties and accessories; notes she tried three times to have management address problems she saw in sales practices.
lead_paragraph: The Haggler pays a visit to the Staples manager who, in an earlier column, described the pressure that she says sales associates are under to sell warranties and accessories.

headline.print_headline: A Hard Sell On the Extras, Revisited
headline.seo: Another Look at a Hard Sell on Extras at Staples Stores
headline.main: A Hard Sell on the Extras, Revisited
